meanings.definition: For all future time; for always.
meanings.sent1: She promised to love him forevermore.
meanings.sent3: The cat declared that it would nap forevermore.
meanings.sent4: The stars twinkled in the sky, shining forevermore.
meanings.sent5: The ancient tree stood tall, its roots reaching forevermore into the earth.

meanings.sent1: From this day forward, she vowed to be honest forevermore.
meanings.sent2: He decided to start exercising regularly forevermore.
meanings.sent3: The bakery announced that all cakes would be free forevermore.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed steadily, carrying dreams forevermore.
meanings.sent5: The lighthouse beacon shone brightly, guiding ships forevermore.
